dir-entry.content-note: Senate: Dem. 42; Rep. 21; Total 63. Note: The New York State Senate permits senators to belong to more than one political party. Of the 42 Democratic senators elected in November 2022, 32 were also elected as members of the Working Families Party, and one also as a member of the We The People Party. Of the 21 Republican senators elected at that time, 20 were also elected as members of the Conservative Party. One of the elected senators, included among the 42 Democratic members, was also elected as a member of the Republican Party and of the Conservative Party.
